title: RiPaRi ReMiX
info:
comments from the song file:

RiPaRi ReMiX is a compilation of 5 most "beloved" christian melodies sung in confirmation camps all over Finland

1. Nousevaan aamuun (Simojoki/FiNe ReMix)
2. Evankeliumi (Simojoki(FiNe RaVeDaNcE rEmIx)
3. Kirkossa (Nuutinen/MeTaL rEmIx)
4. Onneni on olla Herraa lähellä (Simojoki/NoTsKi ReMiX)
5. Tänään häneen uskon (Simojoki/AmAtEuR oRcHeStRa ReMiX)

Remember those good old ripari times? Want to sing these tunes again? Want all the verses and even the words for some of these? Then, e-mail me at min@rack.improvers.fi

God's ok, but these songs sure aren't.
